name: Under The Light (Archille)
description:
Please read the controls at the bottom of the page!

STORY

It was abducted and used as a test item. Puzzles were solved and mocked. He should have escaped from here.

In this short game, you play a hero who is kidnapped and used as a test item. You will solve puzzles to find your way out, but be careful - the kidnapper is always watching. Can you escape before it's too late?

CONTROLS / RULES / GAMEPLAY

  1. To turn the book, hold down the left mouse click from the bottom of the page and pull. "Turn the pages slowly!"
  2. REMEMBER to read the book in every new room!
  3. DO NOT FORGET to buy the item given in each room!
  4. ESC - Leaving the book.
  5. E - Interaction
